document_data.name: Galagard's Compendium of Spells Netherese
document_data.mainbody: '''''Galagard's Compendium of Spells Netherese''''' was a [[spellbook]] featuring in a vision sent by [[Mystra]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|767}}, [[Elminster Aumar]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]], was shown a number of visions and temptations by [[Mystra]]. One of them was a room full of spellbooks, including one especially thick volume labeled ''Galagard's Compendium of Spells Netherese''. It was unclear whether these specific books actually existed outside of the vision.
